analyzed: rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin las kyi rigs phrag dog dga' ma'o//

original: de la lha mo bzhi ni lo bcu drug lon pa thun mong ma yin par mdzes pa /
analyzed: de la lha mo bzhi ni lo bcu drug lon pa thun mong ma yin par mdzes pa /
translated: The four goddesses are sixteen years old, uncommonly beautiful,

original: gzugs dang lang tsho dang ldan pa ji ltar mdzes par yang dag par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs dang lang tsho dang ldan pa ji ltar mdzes par yang dag par gnas pa'o //
translated: endowed with form and youth, and situated in whatever way is pleasing.

original: sku bzhi'i bdag nyid sngon bzhin yid du 'ong ba rgyal ba'i yon tan thams cad kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa /
analyzed: sku bzhi'i bdag nyid sngon bzhin yid du 'ong ba rgyal ba'i yon tan thams cad kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa /
translated: They are the nature of the four bodies, as before, attractive, and the nature of all the qualities of the Victor.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin can de dag gi dbus su a'a li'i rang bzhin rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs 'di ni rdo rje dbyings dang po nas grub pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin can de dag gi dbus su a'a li'i rang bzhin rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs 'di ni rdo rje dbyings dang po nas grub pa'o //
translated: They have the nature of the five Tathagatas. In the middle of them is the form of Vajrasattva, the nature of Ah Li. This is the original establishment of the Vajra Realm.

original: gzhung 'di byas pa'i dge ba gang phyir 'bad ba cung zad mdor bsdus slob mas rtogs bya'i phyir //
analyzed: gzhung 'di byas pa'i dge ba gang phyir 'bad ba cung zad mdor bsdus slob mas rtogs bya'i phyir //
translated: The virtue of composing this text is for the sake of the disciples, so that they may understand a little of the condensed effort.

original: cho ga 'di ni bsdus pas sems can rnams la phan pa yun ring du //
analyzed: cho ga 'di ni bsdus pas sems can rnams la phan pa yun ring du //
translated: This ritual is condensed for the sake of the long-term benefit of sentient beings.

original: rgyal ba kun gyi lung dang rigs par ldan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rgyal ba kun gyi lung dang rigs par ldan pa'i phyir //
translated: Because it is endowed with the scriptures and reasoning of all the Victorious Ones.

original: ma lus dge ba 'di ni bdag gis thob pas 'gro ba rnams ni rgyal gyur cig /'di ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin lnga pa dpal gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: ma lus dge ba 'di ni bdag gis thob pas 'gro ba rnams ni rgyal gyur cig /'di ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin lnga pa dpal gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: May all beings be victorious through my attainment of this complete virtue. This concludes the composition of the glorious nondual vajra, the nature of Vajrasattva, the fifth.

original: // / aa mri de bas zhus te gsol ba btab nas brtsams//
analyzed: // / aa mri de bas zhus te gsol ba btab nas brtsams//
translated: Composed at the request and supplication of Am·πõitadeva.
